Synopsis: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Title: True Grit
Cast: Directors:, Ethan Coen, , Joel Coen, | ,     Stars:, Jeff Bridges, , Matt Damon, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Josh Brolin
Synopsis: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

Title: Chaos Walking
Cast: Director:, Doug Liman, | ,     Stars:, Tom Holland, , Daisy Ridley, , Demián Bichir, , David Oyelowo
Synopsis: Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality where all thoughts are seen and heard by everyone.

Title: The English
Cast: Stars:, Emily Blunt, , Chaske Spencer, , Stephen Rea, , Tom Hughes
Synopsis: Follows a woman as she seeks revenge on the man she sees as responsible for the death of her son.

Title: Godless
Cast: Stars:, Jack O'Connell, , Michelle Dockery, , Scoot McNairy, , Merritt Wever
Synopsis: In the 1880s American West, murderous outlaw gang leader Frank Griffin hunts for ex-protege Roy Goode. Frank's chase leads him to La Belle, New Mexico--a town inhabited, after a mining disaster, almost entirely by women.

Title: The Quick and the Dead
Cast: Director:, Sam Raimi, | ,     Stars:, Sharon Stone, , Gene Hackman, , Russell Crowe, , Leonardo DiCaprio
Synopsis: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

Title: Walker, Texas Ranger
Cast: Stars:, Chuck Norris, , Clarence Gilyard Jr., , Sheree J. Wilson, , Noble Willingham
Synopsis: Walker and his partner Trivette are Texas Rangers. They make it their business to battle crime in Dallas and all around the Great State of Texas.

Title: Rango
Cast: Director:, Gore Verbinski, | ,     Stars:, Johnny Depp, , Isla Fisher, , Timothy Olyphant, , Abigail Breslin
Synopsis: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

Title: High Plains Drifter
Cast: Director:, Clint Eastwood, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Verna Bloom, , Marianna Hill, , Mitchell Ryan
Synopsis: A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

Title: The Last Stand
Cast: Director:, Jee-woon Kim, | ,     Stars:, Arnold Schwarzenegger, , Forest Whitaker, , Johnny Knoxville, , Rodrigo Santoro
Synopsis: The leader of a drug cartel busts out of a courthouse and speeds to the Mexican border, where the only thing in his path is a sheriff and his inexperienced staff.

Title: Bonanza

Synopsis: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

Synopsis: A crew of environmental activists plot a daring plan to disrupt an oil pipeline.

Title: Hell on Wheels
Cast: Stars:, Anson Mount, , Colm Meaney, , Robin McLeavy, , Phil Burke
Synopsis: The Civil War is past, but former Confederate soldier Cullen Bohannon can't put it behind him. Fresh are the memories of the death of his wife, killed at the hands of the Union soldiers, an act that sets him on a course of revenge.

Title: The Magnificent Seven
Cast: Director:, John Sturges, | ,     Stars:, Yul Brynner, , Steve McQueen, , Charles Bronson, , Eli Wallach
Synopsis: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

Title: Wagon Train

Synopsis: Stories of the journeys of a wagon train as it leaves post-Civil War Missouri on its way to California through the plains, deserts, and Rocky Mountains.

Synopsis: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Robert De Niro, , Lily Gladstone, , Jesse Plemons
Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Synopsis: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.

Synopsis: Enforcing his own brand of justice, US Marshal Raylan, a strong-willed, quiet law-man haunted by his past, returns to his native town to see that justice is served to those in need.

Cast: Stars:, Sam Elliott, , Tim McGraw, , Faith Hill, , Isabel May
Synopsis: The post-Civil war generation of the Dutton family travels to Texas, and joins a wagon train undertaking the arduous journey west to Oregon, before settling in Montana to establish what would eventually become the Yellowstone Ranch.

Title: Strange Way of Life
Cast: Director:, Pedro Almodóvar, | ,     Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Ethan Hawke, , José Condessa, , Manu Ríos
Synopsis: After twenty-five years Silva rides a horse across the desert to visit his friend Sheriff Jake. They celebrate the meeting, but the next morning Jake tells him that reason for his trip is not to go down the memory lane of their friendship.

Title: Tombstone
Cast: Directors:, George P. Cosmatos, , Kevin Jarre, | ,     Stars:, Kurt Russell, , Val Kilmer, , Sam Elliott, , Bill Paxton
Synopsis: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Synopsis: An old gunslinger and his daughter must face the consequences of his past, when the son of a man he murdered years ago arrives to take his revenge.

Title: Django Unchained

Synopsis: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

Title: Gunsmoke

Synopsis: Marshal Matt Dillon keeps the peace in rough-and-tumble Dodge City.

Cast: Stars:, Melissa Gilbert, , Michael Landon, , Karen Grassle, , Rachel Lindsay Greenbush
Synopsis: The life and adventures of the Ingalls family in the nineteenth century American Midwest.

Synopsis: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.

Title: Deadwood
Cast: Stars:, Timothy Olyphant, , Ian McShane, , Molly Parker, , Brad Dourif
Synopsis: A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.

Title: Joe Pickett
Cast: Stars:, Michael Dorman, , Julianna Guill, , Skywalker Hughes, , Kamryn Pliva
Synopsis: Follows a game warden and his family during a changing political and socioeconomic climate in a small rural town.

Title: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
Cast: Directors:, Ethan Coen, , Joel Coen, | ,     Stars:, Tim Blake Nelson, , Willie Watson, , Clancy Brown, , Danny McCarthy
Synopsis: Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.

Title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Cast: Director:, Sergio Leone, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Eli Wallach, , Lee Van Cleef, , Aldo Giuffrè
Synopsis: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Title: Let Him Go
Cast: Director:, Thomas Bezucha, | ,     Stars:, Diane Lane, , Kevin Costner, , Kayli Carter, , Ryan Bruce
Synopsis: A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson.

Title: Dances with Wolves
Cast: Director:, Kevin Costner, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Costner, , Mary McDonnell, , Graham Greene, , Rodney A. Grant
Synopsis: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.

Title: The Hateful Eight
Cast: Director:, Quentin Tarantino, | ,     Stars:, Samuel L. Jackson, , Kurt Russell, , Jennifer Jason Leigh, , Walton Goggins
Synopsis: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

Title: Hell or High Water
Cast: Director:, David Mackenzie, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Ben Foster, , Jeff Bridges, , Gil Birmingham
Synopsis: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

Title: Wind River
Cast: Director:, Taylor Sheridan, | ,     Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jeremy Renner, , Graham Greene, , Kelsey Asbille
Synopsis: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

Title: Unforgiven
Cast: Director:, Clint Eastwood, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Gene Hackman, , Morgan Freeman, , Richard Harris
Synopsis: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

Title: Walker
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Molly Hagan, , Keegan Allen, , Violet Brinson
Synopsis: A widowed father returns to Austin after one year, attempting to reconnect with his children, navigate clashes with his family, and find common ground with his new partner, while growing increasingly suspicious of his wife's death.

Title: Silverado
Cast: Director:, Lawrence Kasdan, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Kline, , Scott Glenn, , Kevin Costner, , Danny Glover
Synopsis: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Title: Legends of the Fall
Cast: Director:, Edward Zwick, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Anthony Hopkins, , Aidan Quinn, , Julia Ormond

Title: Longmire

Synopsis: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

Cast: Director:, James Mangold, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Christian Bale, , Ben Foster, , Logan Lerman
Synopsis: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Cast: Director:, Kevin Costner, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Costner, , Mary McDonnell, , Graham Greene, , Rodney A. Grant
Synopsis: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.

Title: The Hateful Eight

Title: Hell or High Water
Cast: Director:, David Mackenzie, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Ben Foster, , Jeff Bridges, , Gil Birmingham
Synopsis: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

Title: Wind River
Cast: Director:, Taylor Sheridan, | ,     Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jeremy Renner, , Graham Greene, , Kelsey Asbille
Synopsis: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

Title: Unforgiven
Cast: Director:, Clint Eastwood, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Gene Hackman, , Morgan Freeman, , Richard Harris
Synopsis: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

Title: Walker
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Molly Hagan, , Keegan Allen, , Violet Brinson
Synopsis: A widowed father returns to Austin after one year, attempting to reconnect with his children, navigate clashes with his family, and find common ground with his new partner, while growing increasingly suspicious of his wife's death.

Title: Silverado
Cast: Director:, Lawrence Kasdan, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Kline, , Scott Glenn, , Kevin Costner, , Danny Glover
Synopsis: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Title: Longmire

Synopsis: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

Title: 3:10 to Yuma
Cast: Director:, James Mangold, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Christian Bale, , Ben Foster, , Logan Lerman
Synopsis: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Synopsis: Walker and his partner Trivette are Texas Rangers. They make it their business to battle crime in Dallas and all around the Great State of Texas.

Title: Rango
Cast: Director:, Gore Verbinski, | ,     Stars:, Johnny Depp, , Isla Fisher, , Timothy Olyphant, , Abigail Breslin
Synopsis: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

Title: High Plains Drifter
Cast: Director:, Clint Eastwood, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Verna Bloom, , Marianna Hill, , Mitchell Ryan
Synopsis: A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

Title: The Last Stand
Cast: Director:, Jee-woon Kim, | ,     Stars:, Arnold Schwarzenegger, , Forest Whitaker, , Johnny Knoxville, , Rodrigo Santoro
Synopsis: The leader of a drug cartel busts out of a courthouse and speeds to the Mexican border, where the only thing in his path is a sheriff and his inexperienced staff.

Title: Bonanza
Cast: Stars:, Lorne Greene, , Michael Landon, , Dan Blocker, , Pernell Roberts
Synopsis: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

Title: How to Blow Up a Pipeline
Cast: Director:, Daniel Goldhaber, | ,     Stars:, Ariela Barer, , Kristine Froseth, , Lukas Gage, , Forrest Goodluck
Synopsis: A crew of environmental activists plot a daring plan to disrupt an oil pipeline.

Title: Hell on Wheels
Cast: Stars:, Anson Mount, , Colm Meaney, , Robin McLeavy, , Phil Burke
Synopsis: The Civil War is past, but former Confederate soldier Cullen Bohannon can't put it behind him. Fresh are the memories of the death of his wife, killed at the hands of the Union soldiers, an act that sets him on a course of revenge.

Title: The Magnificent Seven
Cast: Director:, John Sturges, | ,     Stars:, Yul Brynner, , Steve McQueen, , Charles Bronson, , Eli Wallach
Synopsis: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

Title: Wagon Train
Cast: Stars:, Frank McGrath, , Terry Wilson, , Robert Horton, , John McIntire
Synopsis: Stories of the journeys of a wagon train as it leaves post-Civil War Missouri on its way to California through the plains, deserts, and Rocky Mountains.

Title: Desperado
Cast: Director:, Robert Rodriguez, | ,     Stars:, Antonio Banderas, , Salma Hayek, , Joaquim de Almeida, , Cheech Marin
Synopsis: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Robert De Niro, , Lily Gladstone, , Jesse Plemons
Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Title: Yellowstone
Cast: Stars:, Kevin Costner, , Luke Grimes, , Kelly Reilly, , Wes Bentley
Synopsis: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.

Cast: Stars:, Harrison Ford, , Helen Mirren, , Brandon Sklenar, , Julia Schlaepfer
Synopsis: The Duttons face a new set of challenges in the early 20th century, including the rise of Western expansion, Prohibition, and the Great Depression.

Title: Justified
Cast: Stars:, Timothy Olyphant, , Nick Searcy, , Joelle Carter, , Jacob Pitts
Synopsis: Enforcing his own brand of justice, US Marshal Raylan, a strong-willed, quiet law-man haunted by his past, returns to his native town to see that justice is served to those in need.

Cast: Stars:, Sam Elliott, , Tim McGraw, , Faith Hill, , Isabel May
Synopsis: The post-Civil war generation of the Dutton family travels to Texas, and joins a wagon train undertaking the arduous journey west to Oregon, before settling in Montana to establish what would eventually become the Yellowstone Ranch.

Title: Strange Way of Life
Cast: Director:, Pedro Almodóvar, | ,     Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Ethan Hawke, , José Condessa, , Manu Ríos
Synopsis: After twenty-five years Silva rides a horse across the desert to visit his friend Sheriff Jake. They celebrate the meeting, but the next morning Jake tells him that reason for his trip is not to go down the memory lane of their friendship.

Title: Tombstone
Cast: Directors:, George P. Cosmatos, , Kevin Jarre, | ,     Stars:, Kurt Russell, , Val Kilmer, , Sam Elliott, , Bill Paxton
Synopsis: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Title: The Old Way
Cast: Director:, Brett Donowho, | ,     Stars:, Phillip Aguirre, , Ryan Kiera Armstrong, , Clint Howard, , Katelyn Bauer
Synopsis: An old gunslinger and his daughter must face the consequences of his past, when the son of a man he murdered years ago arrives to take his revenge.

Title: Django Unchained
Cast: Director:, Quentin Tarantino, | ,     Stars:, Jamie Foxx, , Christoph Waltz, , Leonardo DiCaprio, , Kerry Washington
Synopsis: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

Title: Gunsmoke
Cast: Stars:, James Arness, , Milburn Stone, , Amanda Blake, , Ken Curtis
Synopsis: Marshal Matt Dillon keeps the peace in rough-and-tumble Dodge City.

Cast: Stars:, Melissa Gilbert, , Michael Landon, , Karen Grassle, , Rachel Lindsay Greenbush
Synopsis: The life and adventures of the Ingalls family in the nineteenth century American Midwest.

Synopsis: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.

Title: Deadwood
Cast: Stars:, Timothy Olyphant, , Ian McShane, , Molly Parker, , Brad Dourif
Synopsis: A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.

Title: Joe Pickett
Cast: Stars:, Michael Dorman, , Julianna Guill, , Skywalker Hughes, , Kamryn Pliva
Synopsis: Follows a game warden and his family during a changing political and socioeconomic climate in a small rural town.

Title: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
Cast: Directors:, Ethan Coen, , Joel Coen, | ,     Stars:, Tim Blake Nelson, , Willie Watson, , Clancy Brown, , Danny McCarthy
Synopsis: Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.

Title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Cast: Director:, Sergio Leone, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Eli Wallach, , Lee Van Cleef, , Aldo Giuffrè
Synopsis: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Title: Let Him Go
Cast: Director:, Thomas Bezucha, | ,     Stars:, Diane Lane, , Kevin Costner, , Kayli Carter, , Ryan Bruce
Synopsis: A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson.

Title: Dances with Wolves
Cast: Director:, Kevin Costner, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Costner, , Mary McDonnell, , Graham Greene, , Rodney A. Grant
Synopsis: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.

Title: The Hateful Eight
Cast: Director:, Quentin Tarantino, | ,     Stars:, Samuel L. Jackson, , Kurt Russell, , Jennifer Jason Leigh, , Walton Goggins
Synopsis: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

Title: Hell or High Water
Cast: Director:, David Mackenzie, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Ben Foster, , Jeff Bridges, , Gil Birmingham
Synopsis: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

Title: Wind River
Cast: Director:, Taylor Sheridan, | ,     Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jeremy Renner, , Graham Greene, , Kelsey Asbille
Synopsis: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

Title: Unforgiven
Cast: Director:, Clint Eastwood, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Gene Hackman, , Morgan Freeman, , Richard Harris
Synopsis: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

Title: Walker
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Molly Hagan, , Keegan Allen, , Violet Brinson
Synopsis: A widowed father returns to Austin after one year, attempting to reconnect with his children, navigate clashes with his family, and find common ground with his new partner, while growing increasingly suspicious of his wife's death.

Title: Silverado
Cast: Director:, Lawrence Kasdan, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Kline, , Scott Glenn, , Kevin Costner, , Danny Glover
Synopsis: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Title: Legends of the Fall
Cast: Director:, Edward Zwick, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Anthony Hopkins, , Aidan Quinn, , Julia Ormond
Synopsis: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

Title: Longmire
Cast: Stars:, Robert Taylor, , Katee Sackhoff, , Lou Diamond Phillips, , Cassidy Freeman
Synopsis: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

Title: 3:10 to Yuma
Cast: Director:, James Mangold, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Christian Bale, , Ben Foster, , Logan Lerman
Synopsis: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Title: Rio Bravo
Cast: Director:, Howard Hawks, | ,     Stars:, John Wayne, , Dean Martin, , Ricky Nelson, , Angie Dickinson
Synopsis: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Title: The Power of the Dog
Cast: Director:, Jane Campion, | ,     Stars:, Benedict Cumberbatch, , Kirsten Dunst, , Jesse Plemons, , Kodi Smit-McPhee
Synopsis: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

Title: Bone Tomahawk
Cast: Director:, S. Craig Zahler, | ,     Stars:, Kurt Russell, , Patrick Wilson, , Matthew Fox, , Richard Jenkins
Synopsis: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

Title: The Ranch
Cast: Stars:, Ashton Kutcher, , Sam Elliott, , Grady Lee Richmond, , Elisha Cuthbert
Synopsis: The son of a Colorado rancher returns home from a semi-pro football career to run the family business.

Title: The Revenant
Cast: Director:, Alejandro G. Iñárritu, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Tom Hardy, , Will Poulter, , Domhnall Gleeson
Synopsis: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

Title: Blazing Saddles
Cast: Director:, Mel Brooks, | ,     Stars:, Cleavon Little, , Gene Wilder, , Slim Pickens, , Harvey Korman
Synopsis: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

Title: The Searchers
Cast: Director:, John Ford, | ,     Stars:, John Wayne, , Jeffrey Hunter, , Vera Miles, , Ward Bond

Synopsis: A crew of environmental activists plot a daring plan to disrupt an oil pipeline.

Title: Hell on Wheels
Cast: Stars:, Anson Mount, , Colm Meaney, , Robin McLeavy, , Phil Burke
Synopsis: The Civil War is past, but former Confederate soldier Cullen Bohannon can't put it behind him. Fresh are the memories of the death of his wife, killed at the hands of the Union soldiers, an act that sets him on a course of revenge.

Cast: Director:, John Sturges, | ,     Stars:, Yul Brynner, , Steve McQueen, , Charles Bronson, , Eli Wallach

Title: Wagon Train

Synopsis: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Robert De Niro, , Lily Gladstone, , Jesse Plemons
Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Synopsis: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.

Title: Justified
Cast: Stars:, Timothy Olyphant, , Nick Searcy, , Joelle Carter, , Jacob Pitts
Synopsis: Enforcing his own brand of justice, US Marshal Raylan, a strong-willed, quiet law-man haunted by his past, returns to his native town to see that justice is served to those in need.

Cast: Stars:, Sam Elliott, , Tim McGraw, , Faith Hill, , Isabel May
Synopsis: The post-Civil war generation of the Dutton family travels to Texas, and joins a wagon train undertaking the arduous journey west to Oregon, before settling in Montana to establish what would eventually become the Yellowstone Ranch.

Title: Strange Way of Life
Cast: Director:, Pedro Almodóvar, | ,     Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Ethan Hawke, , José Condessa, , Manu Ríos
Synopsis: After twenty-five years Silva rides a horse across the desert to visit his friend Sheriff Jake. They celebrate the meeting, but the next morning Jake tells him that reason for his trip is not to go down the memory lane of their friendship.

Title: Tombstone
Cast: Directors:, George P. Cosmatos, , Kevin Jarre, | ,     Stars:, Kurt Russell, , Val Kilmer, , Sam Elliott, , Bill Paxton
Synopsis: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Title: The Old Way

Title: Django Unchained

Synopsis: Marshal Matt Dillon keeps the peace in rough-and-tumble Dodge City.

Title: Deadwood

Synopsis: A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.

Title: Joe Pickett
Cast: Stars:, Michael Dorman, , Julianna Guill, , Skywalker Hughes, , Kamryn Pliva
Synopsis: Follows a game warden and his family during a changing political and socioeconomic climate in a small rural town.

Cast: Directors:, Ethan Coen, , Joel Coen, | ,     Stars:, Tim Blake Nelson, , Willie Watson, , Clancy Brown, , Danny McCarthy
Synopsis: Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.

Title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Cast: Director:, Sergio Leone, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Eli Wallach, , Lee Van Cleef, , Aldo Giuffrè
Synopsis: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Title: Let Him Go
Cast: Director:, Thomas Bezucha, | ,     Stars:, Diane Lane, , Kevin Costner, , Kayli Carter, , Ryan Bruce
Synopsis: A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson.

Title: Dances with Wolves
Cast: Director:, Kevin Costner, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Costner, , Mary McDonnell, , Graham Greene, , Rodney A. Grant
Synopsis: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.

Title: The Hateful Eight
Cast: Director:, Quentin Tarantino, | ,     Stars:, Samuel L. Jackson, , Kurt Russell, , Jennifer Jason Leigh, , Walton Goggins
Synopsis: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

Title: Hell or High Water
Cast: Director:, David Mackenzie, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Ben Foster, , Jeff Bridges, , Gil Birmingham
Synopsis: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

Title: Wind River
Cast: Director:, Taylor Sheridan, | ,     Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jeremy Renner, , Graham Greene, , Kelsey Asbille
Synopsis: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

Title: Unforgiven
Cast: Director:, Clint Eastwood, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Gene Hackman, , Morgan Freeman, , Richard Harris
Synopsis: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

Title: Walker
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Molly Hagan, , Keegan Allen, , Violet Brinson
Synopsis: A widowed father returns to Austin after one year, attempting to reconnect with his children, navigate clashes with his family, and find common ground with his new partner, while growing increasingly suspicious of his wife's death.

Title: Silverado
Cast: Director:, Lawrence Kasdan, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Kline, , Scott Glenn, , Kevin Costner, , Danny Glover
Synopsis: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Title: Legends of the Fall
Cast: Director:, Edward Zwick, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Anthony Hopkins, , Aidan Quinn, , Julia Ormond
Synopsis: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

Title: Longmire
Cast: Stars:, Robert Taylor, , Katee Sackhoff, , Lou Diamond Phillips, , Cassidy Freeman
Synopsis: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

Title: 3:10 to Yuma
Cast: Director:, James Mangold, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Christian Bale, , Ben Foster, , Logan Lerman
Synopsis: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Title: Rio Bravo
Cast: Director:, Howard Hawks, | ,     Stars:, John Wayne, , Dean Martin, , Ricky Nelson, , Angie Dickinson
Synopsis: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Title: The Power of the Dog
Cast: Director:, Jane Campion, | ,     Stars:, Benedict Cumberbatch, , Kirsten Dunst, , Jesse Plemons, , Kodi Smit-McPhee
Synopsis: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

Title: Bone Tomahawk
Cast: Director:, S. Craig Zahler, | ,     Stars:, Kurt Russell, , Patrick Wilson, , Matthew Fox, , Richard Jenkins
Synopsis: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

Title: The Ranch
Cast: Stars:, Ashton Kutcher, , Sam Elliott, , Grady Lee Richmond, , Elisha Cuthbert
Synopsis: The son of a Colorado rancher returns home from a semi-pro football career to run the family business.

Synopsis: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

Synopsis: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

Cast: Director:, James Mangold, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Christian Bale, , Ben Foster, , Logan Lerman

Title: Hell on Wheels

Synopsis: The Civil War is past, but former Confederate soldier Cullen Bohannon can't put it behind him. Fresh are the memories of the death of his wife, killed at the hands of the Union soldiers, an act that sets him on a course of revenge.

Synopsis: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.

Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Robert De Niro, , Lily Gladstone, , Jesse Plemons
Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Synopsis: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.

Synopsis: Enforcing his own brand of justice, US Marshal Raylan, a strong-willed, quiet law-man haunted by his past, returns to his native town to see that justice is served to those in need.

Cast: Stars:, Sam Elliott, , Tim McGraw, , Faith Hill, , Isabel May
Synopsis: The post-Civil war generation of the Dutton family travels to Texas, and joins a wagon train undertaking the arduous journey west to Oregon, before settling in Montana to establish what would eventually become the Yellowstone Ranch.

Title: Tombstone

Synopsis: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Title: Deadwood

Synopsis: Follows a game warden and his family during a changing political and socioeconomic climate in a small rural town.

Synopsis: Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.

Cast: Director:, Sergio Leone, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Eli Wallach, , Lee Van Cleef, , Aldo Giuffrè
Synopsis: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Title: Let Him Go
Cast: Director:, Thomas Bezucha, | ,     Stars:, Diane Lane, , Kevin Costner, , Kayli Carter, , Ryan Bruce
Synopsis: A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson.

Title: Dances with Wolves
Cast: Director:, Kevin Costner, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Costner, , Mary McDonnell, , Graham Greene, , Rodney A. Grant
Synopsis: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.

Title: The Hateful Eight
Cast: Director:, Quentin Tarantino, | ,     Stars:, Samuel L. Jackson, , Kurt Russell, , Jennifer Jason Leigh, , Walton Goggins
Synopsis: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

Title: Hell or High Water
Cast: Director:, David Mackenzie, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Ben Foster, , Jeff Bridges, , Gil Birmingham
Synopsis: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

Title: Wind River
Cast: Director:, Taylor Sheridan, | ,     Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jeremy Renner, , Graham Greene, , Kelsey Asbille
Synopsis: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

Title: Unforgiven
Cast: Director:, Clint Eastwood, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Gene Hackman, , Morgan Freeman, , Richard Harris
Synopsis: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

Title: Walker
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Molly Hagan, , Keegan Allen, , Violet Brinson
Synopsis: A widowed father returns to Austin after one year, attempting to reconnect with his children, navigate clashes with his family, and find common ground with his new partner, while growing increasingly suspicious of his wife's death.

Title: Silverado
Cast: Director:, Lawrence Kasdan, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Kline, , Scott Glenn, , Kevin Costner, , Danny Glover
Synopsis: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Title: Legends of the Fall
Cast: Director:, Edward Zwick, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Anthony Hopkins, , Aidan Quinn, , Julia Ormond
Synopsis: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

Title: Longmire
Cast: Stars:, Robert Taylor, , Katee Sackhoff, , Lou Diamond Phillips, , Cassidy Freeman
Synopsis: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

Title: 3:10 to Yuma
Cast: Director:, James Mangold, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Christian Bale, , Ben Foster, , Logan Lerman
Synopsis: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Title: Rio Bravo
Cast: Director:, Howard Hawks, | ,     Stars:, John Wayne, , Dean Martin, , Ricky Nelson, , Angie Dickinson
Synopsis: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Title: The Power of the Dog
Cast: Director:, Jane Campion, | ,     Stars:, Benedict Cumberbatch, , Kirsten Dunst, , Jesse Plemons, , Kodi Smit-McPhee
Synopsis: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

Title: Bone Tomahawk
Cast: Director:, S. Craig Zahler, | ,     Stars:, Kurt Russell, , Patrick Wilson, , Matthew Fox, , Richard Jenkins
Synopsis: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

Title: The Ranch
Cast: Stars:, Ashton Kutcher, , Sam Elliott, , Grady Lee Richmond, , Elisha Cuthbert
Synopsis: The son of a Colorado rancher returns home from a semi-pro football career to run the family business.

Title: The Revenant
Cast: Director:, Alejandro G. Iñárritu, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Tom Hardy, , Will Poulter, , Domhnall Gleeson
Synopsis: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

Title: Blazing Saddles
Cast: Director:, Mel Brooks, | ,     Stars:, Cleavon Little, , Gene Wilder, , Slim Pickens, , Harvey Korman
Synopsis: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

Title: The Searchers
Cast: Director:, John Ford, | ,     Stars:, John Wayne, , Jeffrey Hunter, , Vera Miles, , Ward Bond

Cast: Director:, Clint Eastwood, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Gene Hackman, , Morgan Freeman, , Richard Harris
Synopsis: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

Title: Walker
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Molly Hagan, , Keegan Allen, , Violet Brinson
Synopsis: A widowed father returns to Austin after one year, attempting to reconnect with his children, navigate clashes with his family, and find common ground with his new partner, while growing increasingly suspicious of his wife's death.

Title: Longmire

Synopsis: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

Cast: Director:, James Mangold, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Christian Bale, , Ben Foster, , Logan Lerman
Synopsis: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Title: Hell or High Water

Synopsis: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

Title: Wind River
Cast: Director:, Taylor Sheridan, | ,     Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jeremy Renner, , Graham Greene, , Kelsey Asbille
Synopsis: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

Title: Unforgiven
Cast: Director:, Clint Eastwood, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Gene Hackman, , Morgan Freeman, , Richard Harris
Synopsis: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

Title: Walker
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Molly Hagan, , Keegan Allen, , Violet Brinson
Synopsis: A widowed father returns to Austin after one year, attempting to reconnect with his children, navigate clashes with his family, and find common ground with his new partner, while growing increasingly suspicious of his wife's death.

Title: Silverado
Cast: Director:, Lawrence Kasdan, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Kline, , Scott Glenn, , Kevin Costner, , Danny Glover
Synopsis: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Title: Legends of the Fall
Cast: Director:, Edward Zwick, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Anthony Hopkins, , Aidan Quinn, , Julia Ormond
Synopsis: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

Title: Longmire
Cast: Stars:, Robert Taylor, , Katee Sackhoff, , Lou Diamond Phillips, , Cassidy Freeman
Synopsis: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

Title: 3:10 to Yuma
Cast: Director:, James Mangold, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Christian Bale, , Ben Foster, , Logan Lerman
Synopsis: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Title: Rio Bravo
Cast: Director:, Howard Hawks, | ,     Stars:, John Wayne, , Dean Martin, , Ricky Nelson, , Angie Dickinson
Synopsis: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Title: The Power of the Dog
Cast: Director:, Jane Campion, | ,     Stars:, Benedict Cumberbatch, , Kirsten Dunst, , Jesse Plemons, , Kodi Smit-McPhee
Synopsis: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

Title: Bone Tomahawk
Cast: Director:, S. Craig Zahler, | ,     Stars:, Kurt Russell, , Patrick Wilson, , Matthew Fox, , Richard Jenkins
Synopsis: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

Title: The Ranch
Cast: Stars:, Ashton Kutcher, , Sam Elliott, , Grady Lee Richmond, , Elisha Cuthbert
Synopsis: The son of a Colorado rancher returns home from a semi-pro football career to run the family business.

Cast: Director:, Sergio Leone, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Eli Wallach, , Lee Van Cleef, , Aldo Giuffrè

Title: Dances with Wolves
Cast: Director:, Kevin Costner, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Costner, , Mary McDonnell, , Graham Greene, , Rodney A. Grant
Synopsis: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.

Title: The Hateful Eight

Synopsis: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

Title: Hell or High Water
Cast: Director:, David Mackenzie, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Ben Foster, , Jeff Bridges, , Gil Birmingham
Synopsis: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

Title: Wind River
Cast: Director:, Taylor Sheridan, | ,     Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jeremy Renner, , Graham Greene, , Kelsey Asbille
Synopsis: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

Title: Unforgiven
Cast: Director:, Clint Eastwood, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Gene Hackman, , Morgan Freeman, , Richard Harris
Synopsis: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

Title: Walker
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Molly Hagan, , Keegan Allen, , Violet Brinson
Synopsis: A widowed father returns to Austin after one year, attempting to reconnect with his children, navigate clashes with his family, and find common ground with his new partner, while growing increasingly suspicious of his wife's death.

Title: Silverado
Cast: Director:, Lawrence Kasdan, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Kline, , Scott Glenn, , Kevin Costner, , Danny Glover
Synopsis: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Title: Legends of the Fall
Cast: Director:, Edward Zwick, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Anthony Hopkins, , Aidan Quinn, , Julia Ormond
Synopsis: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

Title: Longmire
Cast: Stars:, Robert Taylor, , Katee Sackhoff, , Lou Diamond Phillips, , Cassidy Freeman
Synopsis: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

Title: 3:10 to Yuma
Cast: Director:, James Mangold, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Christian Bale, , Ben Foster, , Logan Lerman
Synopsis: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Title: Rio Bravo
Cast: Director:, Howard Hawks, | ,     Stars:, John Wayne, , Dean Martin, , Ricky Nelson, , Angie Dickinson
Synopsis: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Title: The Power of the Dog
Cast: Director:, Jane Campion, | ,     Stars:, Benedict Cumberbatch, , Kirsten Dunst, , Jesse Plemons, , Kodi Smit-McPhee
Synopsis: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

Title: Bone Tomahawk
Cast: Director:, S. Craig Zahler, | ,     Stars:, Kurt Russell, , Patrick Wilson, , Matthew Fox, , Richard Jenkins
Synopsis: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

Title: The Ranch
Cast: Stars:, Ashton Kutcher, , Sam Elliott, , Grady Lee Richmond, , Elisha Cuthbert
Synopsis: The son of a Colorado rancher returns home from a semi-pro football career to run the family business.

Title: The Revenant
Cast: Director:, Alejandro G. Iñárritu, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Tom Hardy, , Will Poulter, , Domhnall Gleeson
Synopsis: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

Title: Blazing Saddles
Cast: Director:, Mel Brooks, | ,     Stars:, Cleavon Little, , Gene Wilder, , Slim Pickens, , Harvey Korman
Synopsis: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

Title: The Searchers
Cast: Director:, John Ford, | ,     Stars:, John Wayne, , Jeffrey Hunter, , Vera Miles, , Ward Bond

Synopsis: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Title: Dances with Wolves
Cast: Director:, Kevin Costner, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Costner, , Mary McDonnell, , Graham Greene, , Rodney A. Grant

Title: Hell or High Water

Synopsis: Toby is a divorced father who's trying to make a better life. His brother is an ex-con with a short temper and a loose trigger finger. Together, they plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

Title: Wind River
Cast: Director:, Taylor Sheridan, | ,     Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jeremy Renner, , Graham Greene, , Kelsey Asbille
Synopsis: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

Title: Unforgiven
Cast: Director:, Clint Eastwood, | ,     Stars:, Clint Eastwood, , Gene Hackman, , Morgan Freeman, , Richard Harris
Synopsis: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

Title: Walker
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Molly Hagan, , Keegan Allen, , Violet Brinson
Synopsis: A widowed father returns to Austin after one year, attempting to reconnect with his children, navigate clashes with his family, and find common ground with his new partner, while growing increasingly suspicious of his wife's death.

Title: Silverado
Cast: Director:, Lawrence Kasdan, | ,     Stars:, Kevin Kline, , Scott Glenn, , Kevin Costner, , Danny Glover
Synopsis: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Title: Legends of the Fall
Cast: Director:, Edward Zwick, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Anthony Hopkins, , Aidan Quinn, , Julia Ormond
Synopsis: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

Title: Longmire
Cast: Stars:, Robert Taylor, , Katee Sackhoff, , Lou Diamond Phillips, , Cassidy Freeman
Synopsis: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

Title: 3:10 to Yuma
Cast: Director:, James Mangold, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Christian Bale, , Ben Foster, , Logan Lerman
Synopsis: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Title: Rio Bravo
Cast: Director:, Howard Hawks, | ,     Stars:, John Wayne, , Dean Martin, , Ricky Nelson, , Angie Dickinson
Synopsis: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Title: The Power of the Dog
Cast: Director:, Jane Campion, | ,     Stars:, Benedict Cumberbatch, , Kirsten Dunst, , Jesse Plemons, , Kodi Smit-McPhee
Synopsis: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

Title: Bone Tomahawk
Cast: Director:, S. Craig Zahler, | ,     Stars:, Kurt Russell, , Patrick Wilson, , Matthew Fox, , Richard Jenkins
Synopsis: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

Title: The Ranch
Cast: Stars:, Ashton Kutcher, , Sam Elliott, , Grady Lee Richmond, , Elisha Cuthbert
Synopsis: The son of a Colorado rancher returns home from a semi-pro football career to run the family business.

Title: The Revenant
Cast: Director:, Alejandro G. Iñárritu, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Tom Hardy, , Will Poulter, , Domhnall Gleeson
Synopsis: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

Title: Blazing Saddles
Cast: Director:, Mel Brooks, | ,     Stars:, Cleavon Little, , Gene Wilder, , Slim Pickens, , Harvey Korman
Synopsis: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

Title: The Searchers

Synopsis: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Cast: Director:, Taylor Sheridan, | ,     Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jeremy Renner, , Graham Greene, , Kelsey Asbille

Title: Longmire

Synopsis: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

Title: 3:10 to Yuma
Cast: Director:, James Mangold, | ,     Stars:, Russell Crowe, , Christian Bale, , Ben Foster, , Logan Lerman
Synopsis: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Synopsis: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Cast: Director:, Jane Campion, | ,     Stars:, Benedict Cumberbatch, , Kirsten Dunst, , Jesse Plemons, , Kodi Smit-McPhee
Synopsis: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

Cast: Director:, S. Craig Zahler, | ,     Stars:, Kurt Russell, , Patrick Wilson, , Matthew Fox, , Richard Jenkins

Title: The Ranch
Cast: Stars:, Ashton Kutcher, , Sam Elliott, , Grady Lee Richmond, , Elisha Cuthbert
Synopsis: The son of a Colorado rancher returns home from a semi-pro football career to run the family business.
